H3.text: how long has tom brady been the patriots quarterback. 2001

A4.text: Brady was selected 199th overall by the Patriots in the sixth round of the 2000 NFL draft.

A5.text: He became the starting quarterback during his second season, which saw the Patriots win their first Super Bowl title in Super Bowl XXXVI.

A6.text: Long-time starting quarterback Drew Bledsoe, who was the franchise's star throughout the 1990s, went down with a sheared blood vessel in his chest in a week two match-up in 2001 against the rival New York Jets.

A7.text: Brady departed the Patriots after 20 seasons for free agency, signing with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
